Attribute.Name: WRIN Suffix Attributes for Ops Supply
Attribute.ValueTemplate: <derive expr="IF(value('ProductGroup')="Operating Supplies", concatenate( value('ConvertTradeItemWeight'), IF(PRODUNIT('ConvertTradeItemWeight')="kg"," kg",""),IF(PRODUNIT('ConvertTradeItemWeight')="lb"," lb",""), IF(PRODUNIT('ConvertTradeItemWeight')="g"," g",""),IF(PRODUNIT('ConvertTradeItemWeight')="oz"," oz",""), ';', value('TotalPackQty'), ';', value('ConvertTradeItemVolume'),IF(PRODUNIT('ConvertTradeItemVolume')="fl oz"," fl oz ",""),IF(PRODUNIT('ConvertTradeItemVolume')="gal"," gal ",""),IF(PRODUNIT('ConvertTradeItemVolume')="ml"," ml",""),IF(PRODUNIT('ConvertTradeItemVolume')="l"," l",""), ';', value('TradeItemLanguage'), ';', value('CaseLanguage'), ';', value('PackQty'), ';', value('PackCount'), ';', value('PackagingType'), ';', value('TradeItemGraphics') ),"" )"/>

MetaData.Value: It is used to calculate Suffix attributes for Ops Supply.
